review:
the game rn is the 3'd worst rated on steam https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/752246288656891904/1139621742474702858/image.png

I cant make that shit up

Blizzard putting a game on Steam to try and save it is already a big red flag.
They really took one of the best multiplayer games out there and ruined because of their greed.
They can't balance it for sh*t anymore either.

Imagine releasing a "dlc" and it's only 1 hour of gameplay lmao.

If you care about competitive don't even think about playing for now cause it's filled with quitters who've recently picked the game up again through steam and they don't care if they win or not, terrible experience + ranking system is absolutely trash.

Just play Team Fortress 2 instead and have a better time, at least it has MvM and the community is fun to play with.

No recomiendo el juego si quieres tener vida social, llevo mas de 500 horas en este juego y puedo asegurar que vicia mas que la cocaÃ­na, por favor no lo jueguen porque van a perder a los amigos a las pocas partidas

Pero he podido desinstalar Battle.net asi que 11/10

After trying for a while, game launches at least.

Once I do the initial settings it goes to a black screen.

On this screen it either gives me an error that it cant detect my GPU, or straight up BSODs my PC.

I haven't even gotten into the gameplay and microtransactions yet and it is already a very poor experience.

é»„æ—­ä¸œ
Fuck Blizzard, but its a fun game

People will say this is the worst game and proceed to play it for 9 hours straight. Look at the time played when a review is posted, and then current time played, its fun to see people act like its the worst thing they've ever played and then binge it all day. if you REALLY want to make a statement, stop playing the game.

The quality of overwatch 2 is arguably worse then the team behind overwatch, but it is not the "worst game." nor is it magically worse then the game it was built off, the game does suffer from a very toxic hive mind of a community though.

Great game, everyone! It was an honor to play with you all. Thank you. Wishing you all the best. Good game! Best of luck to you all! Gee whiz! That was fun. Good playing! Well played. I salute you all. I'm wrestling with some insecurity issues in my life but thank you all for playing with me. Ah shucks... you guys are the best! It's past my bedtime. Please don't tell my mommy. I could really use a hug right now. I feel very, very small... please hold me... I'm trying to be a nicer person. It's hard, but I am trying, guys. C'mon, Mom! One more game before you tuck me in. Oops mistell. Mommy says people my age shouldn't suck their thumbs. For glory and honor! Huzzah comrades!

bring back 6v6 - 5v5 is for incontinent children

Look, blizzard as a company is awful, but the game is still good.
